issue.title: SHOP : Click on minimap to edit perimeter
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

To ease basket usage:
Click on the minimap in the basket to open the perimeter popup (only the button opens it currently)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
